responses.rationale: Factual reporting of risk based on contact, using neutral descriptive language.
Factual reporting of risk and standard precaution advice, using neutral language.
Factual reporting of expected price increase and contributing factors, using neutral language.
Factual reporting of low risk assessment and preparedness measures.
Contains vivid descriptions of symptoms ('Screaming very loud', 'whole-body tremors') which are explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit framing cue from a quoted source ('bad guy viruses').
Factual description of virus characteristics ('highly contagious') and spread mechanism.
Factual reporting of a quoted assessment regarding risk based on virus spread.
